Frameshift variant expression vs snip count difference
========================================================

```{r, echo=FALSE}
source('plot_chromosome.R')
df <- load_data()
```

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6, echo=FALSE}
res <- plot_all(df_)
print(res$plot)
print.data.frame(res$summary, row.names = FALSE)
```


```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6, echo=FALSE}

for (i in 1:10) {
  res <- filter_and_plot(df, i)
  print(res$plot)
  print.data.frame(res$summary, row.names = FALSE)
}

```
